name: Wizard Vs Zombie - Match 3
description:
You are a Wizard with many amazing spells, levels with Weeds, Stones, Fire Ball, Bats, Branches, Slime, Jelly, Blocks.

New Duel Mode Levels - Play against AI to win these exciting levels.

Spell bounding addictive game, offers 450 levels of increasing difficulty making the game as enjoyable for adults and children alike.

You are a Wizard with many amazing spells and can create or use many power up’s to help you complete the levels and stop the zombie attacking.

Complete the tasks along the way, levels with Score limits, Collection goals, Drop items and Time limits, plus more. Use your wizard skills to create bombs and amazing visual spells to keep the zombie away.

Daily Wheel Bonus.

in Game Language’s : English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Russian, Portuguese, Chinese and Japanese.

Everyone will love and enjoy this magical battling Wizard against Zombie’s with full 3D characters and amazing Effects.

If you like Match 3 games, download for free Wizard Vs Zombie now.
